String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} has unlocked an adorable pair of pet-themed mailboxes! {F0.She}{M0.He} can now craft Swampwater Taffy and Cooler than Liquid Nitrogen Nutrition Bar at the Medicine Crafting Table.

String.Source:
It takes a steady hand, compassionate heart, and good knowledge of animal medical anatomy to be a great veterinarian.
Examine and Treat pets at your Vet Clinic to increase this skill!
String.Dest:
It takes a steady hand, compassionate heart, and good knowledge of animal medical anatomy to be a great veterinarian.
Examine and Treat pets at your Vet Clinic to increase this skill!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} is now level 2 Pet Training and can teach {F0.Her}{M0.His} dog to Heel, Shake, and Play Dead. Don't forget to take the time to Practice Tricks.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} is now level 2 Pet Training and can teach {F0.Her}{M0.His} dog to Heel, Shake, and Play Dead. Don't forget to take the time to Practice Tricks.

String.Source: By reaching level 4 of the Pet Training Skill, {0.SimFirstName} is able to Show off Pet Tricks and command {F0.her}{M0.his} dog to Attack.
String.Dest: By reaching level 4 of the Pet Training Skill, {0.SimFirstName} is able to Show off Pet Tricks and command {F0.her}{M0.his} dog to Attack.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} has acquired the Pet training Skill. {F0.She}{M0.He} will be able to train dogs to Sit, Speak, Fetch, Roll Over, and Lie Down, as well as show off their pet to other Sims.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} has acquired the Pet training Skill. {F0.She}{M0.He} will be able to train dogs to Sit, Speak, Fetch, Roll Over, and Lie Down, as well as show off their pet to other Sims.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} has reached level 3 of the Pet Training Skill. {F0.She}{M0.He} is now able to send {F0.her}{M0.his} dog to explore.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} has reached level 3 of the Pet Training Skill. {F0.She}{M0.He} is now able to send {F0.her}{M0.his} dog to explore.

String.Source: At the highest level of the Pet Training skill, {0.SimFirstName} can have {F0.her}{M0.his} dog Perform Tricks for passing Sims, and will be able to teach tricks to dogs faster.
String.Dest: At the highest level of the Pet Training skill, {0.SimFirstName} can have {F0.her}{M0.his} dog Perform Tricks for passing Sims, and will be able to teach tricks to dogs faster.

String.Source: Dogs being able to perform tricks is a basic expectation. Once trained, the dog can perform the trick on command.
String.Dest: Dogs being able to perform tricks is a basic expectation. Once trained, the dog can perform the trick on command.

String.Source: {4.String}: A cat was adopted by the {3.String} household.
String.Dest: {4.String}: A cat was adopted by the {3.String} household.

String.Source: {4.String}: The {3.String} household recently adopted a cat.
String.Dest: {4.String}: The {3.String} household recently adopted a cat.

String.Source: {4.String}: A dog was adopted by the {3.String} household.
String.Dest: {4.String}: A dog was adopted by the {3.String} household.

String.Source: {4.String}: The {3.String} household recently adopted a dog.
String.Dest: {4.String}: The {3.String} household recently adopted a dog.

String.Source: Relationships with animals begin at higher values.
String.Dest: Relationships with animals begin at higher values.

String.Source: It is easier to Train and Discipline animals as well as gain relationship with them faster.
String.Dest: It is easier to Train and Discipline animals as well as gain relationship with them faster.

String.Source: (From completing the Friend of the Animals Aspiration)
String.Dest: (From completing the Friend of the Animals Aspiration)

String.Source: Skillfully training pets comes in handy for those who consider eliciting tricks from dogs, on command, to be a vital life skill.
String.Dest: Skillfully training pets comes in handy for those who consider eliciting tricks from dogs, on command, to be a vital life skill.

String.Source: With a steady hand, compassionate heart, and good knowledge of animal medical anatomy, you've got a head start on becoming a great veterinarian.
String.Dest: With a steady hand, compassionate heart, and good knowledge of animal medical anatomy, you've got a head start on becoming a great veterinarian.

String.Source: These Sims tend to make cats their companions, preferring the company of cats to other Sims.
String.Dest: These Sims tend to make cats their companions, preferring the company of cats to other Sims.

String.Source: These Sims love to be near dogs. They will gain relationships faster with dogs and socialize with dogs more than the average Sim.
String.Dest: These Sims love to be near dogs. They will gain relationships faster with dogs and socialize with dogs more than the average Sim.

String.Source: These cats are more active than other cats. They really like to pounce and run around.
String.Dest: These cats are more active than other cats. They really like to pounce and run around.

String.Source: These dogs are very energetic. They really like running and enjoy frequent walks.
String.Dest: These dogs are very energetic. They really like running and enjoy frequent walks.

String.Source: These dogs will be more hostile when greeting others and might attack others unless properly trained.
String.Dest: These dogs will be more hostile when greeting others and might attack others unless properly trained.

String.Source: These cats are fairly protective of their territory. They will be aggressive to anyone new they meet.
String.Dest: These cats are fairly protective of their territory. They will be aggressive to anyone new they meet.

String.Source: These cats are more curious about their surroundings. They like to search different objects around the house.
String.Dest: These cats are more curious about their surroundings. They like to search different objects around the house.

String.Source: These dogs are naturally more curious and like to investigate different objects around the house.
String.Dest: These dogs are naturally more curious and like to investigate different objects around the house.

String.Source: These pets tend to be Friendly to other Sims, and will happily greet other Sims around them.
String.Dest: These pets tend to be Friendly to other Sims, and will happily greet other Sims around them.

String.Source: These pets will eat significantly more often, and much more messily!
String.Dest: These pets will eat significantly more often, and much more messily!

String.Source: These cats are more fluffy than normal! They'll hack up hairballs more often.
String.Dest: These cats are more fluffy than normal! They'll hack up hairballs more often.

String.Source: These dogs will leave hair piles laying around. Brush their fur to keep things tidy!
String.Dest: These dogs will leave hair piles laying around. Brush their fur to keep things tidy!

String.Source: These cats enjoy prowling around the neighborhood. Send them out and they might come back with something they've found.
String.Dest: These cats enjoy prowling around the neighborhood. Send them out and they might come back with something they've found.

String.Source: These dogs are natural hunters. Send them off into the world and they'll hunt and dig for things.
String.Dest: These dogs are natural hunters. Send them off into the world and they'll hunt and dig for things.

String.Source: These cats don't really need owners, they're just here for the free food.
String.Dest: These cats don't really need owners, they're just here for the free food.

String.Source: These dogs are less likely to need constant affection and can even walk themselves.
String.Dest: These dogs are less likely to need constant affection and can even walk themselves.

String.Source: These cats really enjoy their catnaps. They also are less likely to jump from place to place since it takes too much effort.
String.Dest: These cats really enjoy their catnaps. They also are less likely to jump from place to place since it takes too much effort.

String.Source: These dogs are low-energy creatures that like to relax and unwind with their owners rather than run around.
String.Dest: These dogs are low-energy creatures that like to relax and unwind with their owners rather than run around.

String.Source: These cats really love their owners. They'll try to stick close to them whenever possible.
String.Dest: These cats really love their owners. They'll try to stick close to them whenever possible.

String.Source: These dogs want to be closer to their owners and love to be petted. They like to follow their owners around.
String.Dest: These dogs want to be closer to their owners and love to be petted. They like to follow their owners around.

String.Source: These cats are always up to no good! They will often misbehave and can even be encouraged to do so.
String.Dest: These cats are always up to no good! They will often misbehave and can even be encouraged to do so.

String.Source: These dogs are always up to nothing good. They will often misbehave and can even be encouraged to do so.
String.Dest: These dogs are always up to nothing good. They will often misbehave and can even be encouraged to do so.

String.Source: These pets love toys and want to play all the time, even when they're not excited.
String.Dest: These pets love toys and want to play all the time, even when they're not excited.

String.Source: These cats are scared of everything. Okay well, almost everything. They also like to hide a lot.
String.Dest: These cats are scared of everything. Okay well, almost everything. They also like to hide a lot.

String.Source: These dogs are easily frightened, and like to hide more often. They will often shy away from things like fights.
String.Dest: These dogs are easily frightened, and like to hide more often. They will often shy away from things like fights.

String.Source: These cats are fast learners, and some say that they can even understand Simlish when spoken to!
String.Dest: These cats are fast learners, and some say that they can even understand Simlish when spoken to!

String.Source: These bright dogs are easier to train and pick up tricks quickly. They might even understand Simlish!
String.Dest: These bright dogs are easier to train and pick up tricks quickly. They might even understand Simlish!

String.Source: These cats are spoiled creatures. Scolding them hardly ever changes their behavior.
String.Dest: These cats are spoiled creatures. Scolding them hardly ever changes their behavior.

String.Source: These Dogs don’t like being told what to do. Scolding them doesn’t do much to change their misbehaviors, but you can try begging them to stop.
String.Dest: These Dogs don’t like being told what to do. Scolding them doesn’t do much to change their misbehaviors, but you can try begging them to stop.

String.Source: These cats love to yowl along with other Sims. They'll even try to sing upon request!
String.Dest: These cats love to yowl along with other Sims. They'll even try to sing upon request!

String.Source: These dogs like to howl occasionally, and can even sing on command.
String.Dest: These dogs like to howl occasionally, and can even sing on command.

String.Source: These cats enjoy wandering around the world, almost as if they were wild animals! But don't worry, they'll always come home for the food.
String.Dest: These cats enjoy wandering around the world, almost as if they were wild animals! But don't worry, they'll always come home for the food.

String.Source: These dogs will sometimes leave the house to go on solo adventures, but are also happy to go on an adventure with their owner.
String.Dest: These dogs will sometimes leave the house to go on solo adventures, but are also happy to go on an adventure with their owner.

String.Source: This pet is "fixed" and cannot reproduce [Placeholder Text]
String.Dest: This pet is "fixed" and cannot reproduce [Placeholder Text]

String.Source: This pet can reproduce via "Woohoo" [Placeholder Text]
String.Dest: This pet can reproduce via "Woohoo" [Placeholder Text]

String.Source: Looks like there was nothing your Pet could find! Maybe try another world…
String.Dest: Looks like there was nothing your Pet could find! Maybe try another world…

String.Source: You’ll need at least 4 obstacle course objects to make a course, but you can put them down individually and pets will still play with them. But the real fun to be had is when you make your own obstacle course!
String.Dest: You’ll need at least 4 obstacle course objects to make a course, but you can put them down individually and pets will still play with them. But the real fun to be had is when you make your own obstacle course!

String.Source: Once you’ve set up your course, click on any of the objects and select the “Run Obstacle Course with…” interaction, and then pick a pet you’d like to run the course with. Depending on your pet’s mood, your Sim’s Pet Training Skill, and some good old-fashioned luck, you might get a gold medal!
String.Dest: Once you’ve set up your course, click on any of the objects and select the “Run Obstacle Course with…” interaction, and then pick a pet you’d like to run the course with. Depending on your pet’s mood, your Sim’s Pet Training Skill, and some good old-fashioned luck, you might get a gold medal!

String.Source: Want to get your cat or dog some exercise in a fun way? Set up an obstacle course in your backyard! There are hoops to jump through, ramps to walk up, poles to weave through, tunnels to crawl in, and platforms to stand on!
String.Dest: Want to get your cat or dog some exercise in a fun way? Set up an obstacle course in your backyard! There are hoops to jump through, ramps to walk up, poles to weave through, tunnels to crawl in, and platforms to stand on!

String.Source: Cats and Dogs are less complex than Sims. They have basic needs like Hunger, Bladder, and Affection/Play. As long as you feed them twice a day, take them out, and play with them on a regular basis, they will be content.
String.Dest: Cats and Dogs are less complex than Sims. They have basic needs like Hunger, Bladder, and Affection/Play. As long as you feed them twice a day, take them out, and play with them on a regular basis, they will be content.

String.Source: Cats and Dogs have a much smaller Emotional scale than Sims. Cats and Dogs will mostly be fine, but sometimes they will become uncomfortable. This means they need something. Try Clicking them and Asking Them "What's Wrong" to find out more information.
String.Dest: Cats and Dogs have a much smaller Emotional scale than Sims. Cats and Dogs will mostly be fine, but sometimes they will become uncomfortable. This means they need something. Try Clicking them and Asking Them "What's Wrong" to find out more information.

String.Source: Cats and Dogs will try telling you they need something by barking or meowing with a helpful thought balloon to point you in the right direction. Be sure to pay attention to their thought balloons.
String.Dest: Cats and Dogs will try telling you they need something by barking or meowing with a helpful thought balloon to point you in the right direction. Be sure to pay attention to their thought balloons.

String.Source: In addition to Traits, Pets also have unique sets of obsessions and fears. Two pets with the exact same traits might have totally different things that they’re fond of and afraid of!
String.Dest: In addition to Traits, Pets also have unique sets of obsessions and fears. Two pets with the exact same traits might have totally different things that they’re fond of and afraid of!

String.Source: Pets who are obsessed with certain things will get excited when that object is nearby or in use. On the other hand, pets who fear those objects won’t be too happy when your Sim uses them. Pay attention to your pet likes and dislikes to make your home comfortable for your furry friend.
String.Dest: Pets who are obsessed with certain things will get excited when that object is nearby or in use. On the other hand, pets who fear those objects won’t be too happy when your Sim uses them. Pay attention to your pet likes and dislikes to make your home comfortable for your furry friend.

String.Source: When your dog indicates that it needs to go potty through whining at the door and thought balloons you will be able to Ask to Go Potty, and they will find an outdoor location to go. The more you encourage them to go outside and reprimand them for going potty indoors will teach them the proper location to go potty in the future.
String.Dest: When your dog indicates that it needs to go potty through whining at the door and thought balloons you will be able to Ask to Go Potty, and they will find an outdoor location to go. The more you encourage them to go outside and reprimand them for going potty indoors will teach them the proper location to go potty in the future.

String.Source: When your dog has learned these tricks any Sim that has a good relationship with your dog can Command them to do these tricks. As you gain skill with Pet Training you will be able to teach and command more interesting tricks like Play Dead or have them Perform Tricks for passing Sims.
String.Dest: When your dog has learned these tricks any Sim that has a good relationship with your dog can Command them to do these tricks. As you gain skill with Pet Training you will be able to teach and command more interesting tricks like Play Dead or have them Perform Tricks for passing Sims.

String.Source: Dogs will need to be taught tricks individually, but you will be able to teach dogs any Tricks you know how to teach.
String.Dest: Dogs will need to be taught tricks individually, but you will be able to teach dogs any Tricks you know how to teach.

String.Source: True to any Pet, the Cats and Dogs in The Sims 4 misbehave. You will see them scratching the furniture, drinking from puddles, or even playing in the trash. While you could let this behavior continue, it’s best to teach your pet to stop these behaviors. When you see your cat or dog misbehaving you will see the option to Lecture or Scold them about this misbehavior. Select one of those options and your Sim will reprimand the cat or dog for the selected misbehavior.
String.Dest: True to any Pet, the Cats and Dogs in The Sims 4 misbehave. You will see them scratching the furniture, drinking from puddles, or even playing in the trash. While you could let this behavior continue, it’s best to teach your pet to stop these behaviors. When you see your cat or dog misbehaving you will see the option to Lecture or Scold them about this misbehavior. Select one of those options and your Sim will reprimand the cat or dog for the selected misbehavior.

String.Source: Each misbehavior will have to be reprimanded out separately, which will allow you to decide if a specific behavior is something you would allow your pet to continue doing.
String.Dest: Each misbehavior will have to be reprimanded out separately, which will allow you to decide if a specific behavior is something you would allow your pet to continue doing.

String.Source: While the change won’t be immediate you should see your pets misbehaving less after reprimanding them, and with enough reinforcement they will learn to not misbehave in such a way.
String.Dest: While the change won’t be immediate you should see your pets misbehaving less after reprimanding them, and with enough reinforcement they will learn to not misbehave in such a way.

String.Source: What is one of the best things about dogs besides the unconditional love and affection? Obviously training them to do tricks. With any adult aged dog you will be able to start training with simple tricks like Sit, Speak, and Lie Down.
String.Dest: What is one of the best things about dogs besides the unconditional love and affection? Obviously training them to do tricks. With any adult aged dog you will be able to start training with simple tricks like Sit, Speak, and Lie Down.

String.Source: Your customers will be rating your Vet Clinic’s service from 1 to 5 stars. These ratings will determine your Vet Clinic’s overall star rating, which influences how many patients will seek out your clinic. Read the “Vet Clinic – Ratings” lesson for more tips on how to effectively service your customers.
String.Dest: Your customers will be rating your Vet Clinic’s service from 1 to 5 stars. These ratings will determine your Vet Clinic’s overall star rating, which influences how many patients will seek out your clinic. Read the “Vet Clinic – Ratings” lesson for more tips on how to effectively service your customers.

String.Source: When you first arrive at your Vet Clinic lot you’ll be asked to transfer some funds to your business to cover basic operating expenses. To learn more about managing your money, read the “Vet Clinic – Funds” lesson.
String.Dest: When you first arrive at your Vet Clinic lot you’ll be asked to transfer some funds to your business to cover basic operating expenses. To learn more about managing your money, read the “Vet Clinic – Funds” lesson.

String.Source: You’ll need a functioning Vet Clinic before you can open for business. Luckily you have the latest and greatest in veterinary technology at your disposal. You’ll need to place at least one Examination Table, Vet Podium, and trash can. It’s also a good idea to place a Surgery Station, Medicine Crafting Table, and Medicine Vending Machine to broaden the options available at your Vet Clinic. You’ll see both cats and dogs of all shapes and sizes come in once you open a Vet Clinic, so it’s good to be prepared for anything.
String.Dest: You’ll need a functioning Vet Clinic before you can open for business. Luckily you have the latest and greatest in veterinary technology at your disposal. You’ll need to place at least one Examination Table, Vet Podium, and trash can. It’s also a good idea to place a Surgery Station, Medicine Crafting Table, and Medicine Vending Machine to broaden the options available at your Vet Clinic. You’ll see both cats and dogs of all shapes and sizes come in once you open a Vet Clinic, so it’s good to be prepared for anything.

String.Source: Sims can own and manage Vet Clinics to earn Simoleons. To purchase a Vet Clinic, use the Phone or Computer and select “Buy a Vet Clinic”. You can also use the Owned Businesses panel to buy a business. You can buy an existing Vet Clinic, or purchase any unoccupied lot and start from scratch.
String.Dest: Sims can own and manage Vet Clinics to earn Simoleons. To purchase a Vet Clinic, use the Phone or Computer and select “Buy a Vet Clinic”. You can also use the Owned Businesses panel to buy a business. You can buy an existing Vet Clinic, or purchase any unoccupied lot and start from scratch.

String.Source: Check out the Owned Businesses panel in the bottom right hand corner. This is where you open and close your Vet Clinic. You’ll find useful information and shortcuts that will help you customize and run your Vet Clinic here. You can even open your Vet Clinic while you’re not there and have your employees earn you money while you’re away!
String.Dest: Check out the Owned Businesses panel in the bottom right hand corner. This is where you open and close your Vet Clinic. You’ll find useful information and shortcuts that will help you customize and run your Vet Clinic here. You can even open your Vet Clinic while you’re not there and have your employees earn you money while you’re away!

String.Source: If you decide you no longer want to own your Vet Clinic, you can offload it by using the “Sell this Business” button in the Vet Clinic Settings Panel. Your business’s funds will be added to the value of the lot and get refunded to your household. Once you’ve sold your Vet Clinic, it’ll continue to be run under new management, and you can even bring your own pet there for checkups and treatments!
String.Dest: If you decide you no longer want to own your Vet Clinic, you can offload it by using the “Sell this Business” button in the Vet Clinic Settings Panel. Your business’s funds will be added to the value of the lot and get refunded to your household. Once you’ve sold your Vet Clinic, it’ll continue to be run under new management, and you can even bring your own pet there for checkups and treatments!

String.Source: Use the “Manage Employees” button on the Owned Businesses panel to quickly check the status of your employees. You can view their skills and current pay level, and see how satisfied they are with their employment. You can use this panel to promote a worthy employee, punish an employee with a demotion, or outright fire a worker who isn’t working out.
String.Dest: Use the “Manage Employees” button on the Owned Businesses panel to quickly check the status of your employees. You can view their skills and current pay level, and see how satisfied they are with their employment. You can use this panel to promote a worthy employee, punish an employee with a demotion, or outright fire a worker who isn’t working out.

String.Source: Running a Vet Clinic by yourself is entirely possible, but it’s going to be hard to juggle practicing veterinary medicine and the business side of things. It’s a good idea to hire employees to do some works like treating patients, crafting medicines, and ickier tasks like mopping up the floor. Select “Manage Employees” on your Owned Businesses Panel to view a list of Sims to hire. Review their skills and starting pay to determine if they’re a good match for your Vet Clinic. If you don’t like the list of applicants, simply try again later and new Sims might apply.
String.Dest: Running a Vet Clinic by yourself is entirely possible, but it’s going to be hard to juggle practicing veterinary medicine and the business side of things. It’s a good idea to hire employees to do some works like treating patients, crafting medicines, and ickier tasks like mopping up the floor. Select “Manage Employees” on your Owned Businesses Panel to view a list of Sims to hire. Review their skills and starting pay to determine if they’re a good match for your Vet Clinic. If you don’t like the list of applicants, simply try again later and new Sims might apply.

String.Source: As your Vet Clinic becomes more successful and well known, you can unlock perks to hire additional Veterinarians using your Perk Points. See the “Vet Clinic – Perks” lesson for more details.
String.Dest: As your Vet Clinic becomes more successful and well known, you can unlock perks to hire additional Veterinarians using your Perk Points. See the “Vet Clinic – Perks” lesson for more details.

String.Source: Vet Employees have 3 different skills that determine how well they work. Review these skills on the “Manage Employees” panel. If you can’t find the perfect Sim to hire, don’t worry! Employees will slowly gain skills over time as they work. The best way to raise an employee’s skills more quickly is to send them to after work training. Just be prepared to pay for it!
String.Dest: Vet Employees have 3 different skills that determine how well they work. Review these skills on the “Manage Employees” panel. If you can’t find the perfect Sim to hire, don’t worry! Employees will slowly gain skills over time as they work. The best way to raise an employee’s skills more quickly is to send them to after work training. Just be prepared to pay for it!

String.Source: An employee’s satisfaction is raised by being paid appropriately for their skill level, receiving praise from their boss, and getting promoted. Berating your employees, demoting them, or working them for long hours without break will lower their satisfaction. If they get too upset, don’t be surprised when they quit!
String.Dest: An employee’s satisfaction is raised by being paid appropriately for their skill level, receiving praise from their boss, and getting promoted. Berating your employees, demoting them, or working them for long hours without break will lower their satisfaction. If they get too upset, don’t be surprised when they quit!

String.Source: Since your Sim is the boss, they have to manage their employees. Your Sim can check in on, praise, criticize, pay for training, promote / demote, or even fire each employee.
String.Dest: Since your Sim is the boss, they have to manage their employees. Your Sim can check in on, praise, criticize, pay for training, promote / demote, or even fire each employee.

String.Source: As a business owner, your funds are tracked separately from your normal household funds. Each business that you own has its own separate funds that are used to cover the business’s expenses. When you visit your business, you can simultaneously view your business’s funds in the Owner Businesses panel in the bottom right corner, along with your household’s funds in the bottom left corner.
String.Dest: As a business owner, your funds are tracked separately from your normal household funds. Each business that you own has its own separate funds that are used to cover the business’s expenses. When you visit your business, you can simultaneously view your business’s funds in the Owner Businesses panel in the bottom right corner, along with your household’s funds in the bottom left corner.

String.Source: You can click on the View Last Finances/View Shift Summary button on the Owner Businesses panel to get a detailed breakdown of your profits and expenses. Use this information to make strategic decisions about your business to help maximize profits.
String.Dest: You can click on the View Last Finances/View Shift Summary button on the Owner Businesses panel to get a detailed breakdown of your profits and expenses. Use this information to make strategic decisions about your business to help maximize profits.

String.Source: Every action taken as an owner while at your business uses money from your business’s funds. This includes building on the lot, placing objects, paying your employees, purchasing advertising, and more. When you enter Build Mode, the money shown in the bottom left corner will switch to display your business funds that you’re building with. Finally, any money you earn from your business will be deposited into your business funds.
String.Dest: Every action taken as an owner while at your business uses money from your business’s funds. This includes building on the lot, placing objects, paying your employees, purchasing advertising, and more. When you enter Build Mode, the money shown in the bottom left corner will switch to display your business funds that you’re building with. Finally, any money you earn from your business will be deposited into your business funds.

String.Source: At any time, you can use the Venue Funds Transfer button near your household’s Simoleons in the bottom left corner to move money between your household and any of the businesses that you own. Within this panel, you can select the account you’re transferring from and to, and enter the amount of Simoleons you want to transfer.
String.Dest: At any time, you can use the Venue Funds Transfer button near your household’s Simoleons in the bottom left corner to move money between your household and any of the businesses that you own. Within this panel, you can select the account you’re transferring from and to, and enter the amount of Simoleons you want to transfer.

String.Source: There’s a chance that your business can go into debt if you don’t have enough money to pay your employees or you purchase advertising while low on funds. If your business doesn’t have enough money to pay its debts, you won’t be allowed to reopen your business until those debts have been cleared. Transfer money from your household to your business to cover your debts.
String.Dest: There’s a chance that your business can go into debt if you don’t have enough money to pay your employees or you purchase advertising while low on funds. If your business doesn’t have enough money to pay its debts, you won’t be allowed to reopen your business until those debts have been cleared. Transfer money from your household to your business to cover your debts.

String.Source: Perks have a direct impact on your Vet Clinic and your household’s Sims that you’re playing. Employees that you fire are not affected by Perks. Instead, employees can be improved separately by building their skills at various tasks. You can learn more about that in the “Vet Clinic – Employees” lesson.
String.Dest: Perks have a direct impact on your Vet Clinic and your household’s Sims that you’re playing. Employees that you fire are not affected by Perks. Instead, employees can be improved separately by building their skills at various tasks. You can learn more about that in the “Vet Clinic – Employees” lesson.

String.Source: Perks are the key to building more efficient Vet Clinics. They will allow you to make your Vet Clinic more profitable and popular. There are a wide variety of perks to choose from. You can unlock the ability to hire additional Veterinarians, change supply quality, and even make pets less stressed during procedures.
String.Dest: Perks are the key to building more efficient Vet Clinics. They will allow you to make your Vet Clinic more profitable and popular. There are a wide variety of perks to choose from. You can unlock the ability to hire additional Veterinarians, change supply quality, and even make pets less stressed during procedures.

String.Source: Owners of Vet Clinics can earn Perk Points from running their Vet Clinic. Players can use those Perk Points to buy Perks which make the Vet Clinic more effective. You’ll find various Perks within the Owner Businesses panel in the bottom right corner of the screen.
String.Dest: Owners of Vet Clinics can earn Perk Points from running their Vet Clinic. Players can use those Perk Points to buy Perks which make the Vet Clinic more effective. You’ll find various Perks within the Owner Businesses panel in the bottom right corner of the screen.

String.Source: Earning Perk Points is simple- examine and treat pets. Interacting with customers and their furry friends will also provide Perk Points. Employees will not earn Perk Points for you, so get to work!
String.Dest: Earning Perk Points is simple- examine and treat pets. Interacting with customers and their furry friends will also provide Perk Points. Employees will not earn Perk Points for you, so get to work!

String.Source: Some Perks provide a temporary bonus, such as the ability to get an influx of extra patients. You can return to purchase these Perks again in the future once your original purchase runs out.
String.Dest: Some Perks provide a temporary bonus, such as the ability to get an influx of extra patients. You can return to purchase these Perks again in the future once your original purchase runs out.

String.Source: You can review details on the Vet Clinic’s rating by hovering over the star rating or clicking on the View Last Finances/View Shift Summary button. Review the summary of feedback to find out what is going well and what needs improvement.
String.Dest: You can review details on the Vet Clinic’s rating by hovering over the star rating or clicking on the View Last Finances/View Shift Summary button. Review the summary of feedback to find out what is going well and what needs improvement.

String.Source: Each customer will display a rating over their head while at the Vet Clinic. The pets will not have a rating over their heads, but you can easily find their owners by hovering over them. When you finish examining and treating a pet, the customer will leave a rating and it will be added to your overall Vet Clinic rating. Care kindly and efficiently for your customers’ pets to raise their rating!
String.Dest: Each customer will display a rating over their head while at the Vet Clinic. The pets will not have a rating over their heads, but you can easily find their owners by hovering over them. When you finish examining and treating a pet, the customer will leave a rating and it will be added to your overall Vet Clinic rating. Care kindly and efficiently for your customers’ pets to raise their rating!

String.Source: Quality of care, supply quality, wait times, proper bedside manner, cleanliness, and Vet Clinic ambiance will all impact a customer’s rating. Veterinarians with high skills will provide better services and be more effective at treating pets. Make sure you have enough staff hired to keep your waiting room from piling up with sick pets.
String.Dest: Quality of care, supply quality, wait times, proper bedside manner, cleanliness, and Vet Clinic ambiance will all impact a customer’s rating. Veterinarians with high skills will provide better services and be more effective at treating pets. Make sure you have enough staff hired to keep your waiting room from piling up with sick pets.

String.Source: Pay close attention to the icons of the Sim’s heads. They will show when the Sim’s rating of the Vet Clinic changes and indicate why. If you miss a change, the tool tip on each Sim will show their last bit of feedback.
String.Dest: Pay close attention to the icons of the Sim’s heads. They will show when the Sim’s rating of the Vet Clinic changes and indicate why. If you miss a change, the tool tip on each Sim will show their last bit of feedback.

String.Source: Customers and their pets will enter the Vet Clinic while it is open, and will gather around the Check-in Podium. Your Vet Clinic’s overall rating and advertising will determine how many patients stop by and how much money you can earn. You can also purchase perks that increase the number of patients.
String.Dest: Customers and their pets will enter the Vet Clinic while it is open, and will gather around the Check-in Podium. Your Vet Clinic’s overall rating and advertising will determine how many patients stop by and how much money you can earn. You can also purchase perks that increase the number of patients.

String.Source: When your pet finally gets seen by a Veterinarian, you’ll need to wait patiently as they perform the proper exams and procedures. Once they finish, you’ll be prompted to choose a treatment option. The cheap option will always result in a cone of shame for your pet, which isn’t going to make them happy!
String.Dest: When your pet finally gets seen by a Veterinarian, you’ll need to wait patiently as they perform the proper exams and procedures. Once they finish, you’ll be prompted to choose a treatment option. The cheap option will always result in a cone of shame for your pet, which isn’t going to make them happy!

String.Source: Once you get to the Vet Clinic, look for the Vet Podium so you can sign your pet in. Depending on how busy the Vet Clinic is, you might have to wait a bit for a Veterinarian to get to you.
String.Dest: Once you get to the Vet Clinic, look for the Vet Podium so you can sign your pet in. Depending on how busy the Vet Clinic is, you might have to wait a bit for a Veterinarian to get to you.

String.Source: Visiting a Vet Clinic is never the highlight of owning a pet, but sometimes your furry friend gets sick and you’ve got to get them treated! You can also get your pet a checkup if you’re worried they might be sick but aren’t sure yet, or take them to the Vet Clinic for spaying and neutering.
String.Dest: Visiting a Vet Clinic is never the highlight of owning a pet, but sometimes your furry friend gets sick and you’ve got to get them treated! You can also get your pet a checkup if you’re worried they might be sick but aren’t sure yet, or take them to the Vet Clinic for spaying and neutering.

String.Source: Sims may adopt a cat or dog into their household.
String.Dest: Sims may adopt a cat or dog into their household.

String.Source: Club Gathering at a Vet Clinic
String.Dest: Club Gathering at a Vet Clinic

String.Source: Meet up with the Club at the Vet Clinic
String.Dest: Meet up with the Club at the Vet Clinic

String.Source: Cure pets of various sicknesses or perform advanced surgeries at the Vet Clinic!
String.Dest: Cure pets of various sicknesses or perform advanced surgeries at the Vet Clinic!

String.Source: {1.SimFirstName} has been pooped on by birds one too many times and has had enough of them!
String.Dest: {1.SimFirstName} has been pooped on by birds one too many times and has had enough of them!

String.Source: {1.SimFirstName} has been pooped on for the last time! It's time for revenge!
String.Dest: {1.SimFirstName} has been pooped on for the last time! It's time for revenge!

String.Source: Known for its hiking trails and sprawling coastal properties, Cavalier Cove is the perfect place to go exploring or chase seagulls with an adventurous pup!
String.Dest: Known for its hiking trails and sprawling coastal properties, Cavalier Cove is the perfect place to go exploring or chase seagulls with an adventurous pup!

String.Source: A favorite hangout for the Bay's feline citizens, who can often be found climbing around down at the docks, Whiskerman's Wharf is also enjoyed by fishermen and tourists alike.
String.Dest: A favorite hangout for the Bay's feline citizens, who can often be found climbing around down at the docks, Whiskerman's Wharf is also enjoyed by fishermen and tourists alike.

String.Source: Once the site of a mysterious shipwreck, Deadgrass Isle is now home to the world-famous Brindleton Light and the city's largest population of indigenous strays. Lately, however, there have been some rumors about strange visitors after sundown...
String.Dest: Once the site of a mysterious shipwreck, Deadgrass Isle is now home to the world-famous Brindleton Light and the city's largest population of indigenous strays. Lately, however, there have been some rumors about strange visitors after sundown...

String.Source: The cultural center of the city, Sable Square is ideal for both cats and dogs. These people love their pets so much, they've built a monument to them right in the middle of town!
String.Dest: The cultural center of the city, Sable Square is ideal for both cats and dogs. These people love their pets so much, they've built a monument to them right in the middle of town!
